name: Don't Sacrifice My Sheeps!
description:
The god Orbor needs a sacrifice every month. The sheepherd was tired of sacrificing his sheeps and decided to change the sacrifice. He made a mistake and sacrificed the sun instead of his sheeps! Now everything is dark and the grass are not growing. Now his sheeps are out of food. Help him getting the sun back.

Game made for LudumDare43 in 3 days.
